      • index

        @RequestMapping(value={"/","/home"},
                produces="text/html")
public String index()
        Returns:
        a HOME-page (just an HTML entry point)

      • getStaticPage

        @RequestMapping(value="/staticPage",
                produces="text/html")
public String getStaticPage()
        Returns:
        a simple static HTML page (only for testing)

      • getStaticCode

        @RequestMapping(value="/pages/**",
                produces="*/*",
                method=GET)
public String getStaticCode(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        WORKAROUND - because the common way doesn't work
        Parameters:
        model - Model - we don't use it
        request - HttpServletRequest - we can read the input address string from the browser
        Returns:
        if the asked file exists: the file content, but not the original file itself if not: an ERROR-Page
